note.p: Career: Chemist, National Institute for Medical Research, Hampstead
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1932-1935 vol l pp 595-606, plate, by H H Dale
References: A F Bristow, T Barrowcliffe and D R Bangham, 'Standardization of biological medicines: the first hundred years, 1900-2000' in NR 2006 vol 60 pp 271-289
